verbLexeme: 1. To make a series of small cuts or marks on something that spoils its appearance; to suffer such an action. English = scratch; (be) scratched.
2. To make a series of small cuts on your or someone else's skin; to suffer such an action. English = scratch; (be) scratched.
nominalLexeme: 1. A series of small cuts or marks that spoil the appearance of an object. English = scratches.
2. A series of small cuts on your skin. English = scratches.
